headline.main: ARGENTINE SILENCE ON POPE ASSAILED; Brazilian Paper Implies Buenos Aires Hides Behind Neutrality

lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct. 1 -- An editorial in Correio da Manha yesterday criticized the Argentine Government's failure to protest against German occupation of Vatican City.
abstract: Brazil press scores Argentine silence oil Ger threat to Pope
snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Oct. 1 -- An editorial in Correio da Manha yesterday criticized the Argentine Government's failure to protest against German occupation of Vatican City....

byline.original: By Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
